Key Match Events: Karl-Anthony Towns and Josh Hart achieved a 20/20 game and a triple-double together, a feat last seen in the 1970s with Willis Reed and Clyde Frazier.
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Thibodeau commented on Tyler Kolek's ability to play two games in one day saying 'It says a lot about himâ€¦ I love him; he's in the gym all the time.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New York Knicks are enjoying an impressive nine-game winning streak.
The Knicks are just half a game behind the second seed.
A significant challenge awaits as the Knicks travel to Oklahoma City to face a Thunder team that has also been on a hot streak.
Others: Mikal Bridges has been on a roll for the Knicks, averaging 23.8 points per game since his remarkable performance on Christmas Day.
Bridges has been impressive, scoring 27 points on 71% shooting against the Utah Jazz.
